about_the_game:
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
The game was created by Byking Inc.

This work is a game produced by Byking Inc. for newcomer training.
It may not work properly depending on your PC environment.
Also, unintentional glitches may occur in the game.
Please understand.

The game cannot be played using a controller.
Keyboard and mouse operation is required for the playing environment.
Please understand this in advance.


The game cannot be played using a controller.

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー


ABOUT THE GAME
"ORDER9" is an "auto-battle card game" where players choose a character, and help lead them to victory over other opponents.



CHARACTER SELECTION
Choose 1 from 9 available characters.
From the remaining, 3 opponents will be randomly chosen to fight you in battle.



CHARACTER ABILITIES
Every character has 3 abilities, "skill", "buff" and "punch".
An ability will be chosen at random each turn.



FLOW OF COMBAT
Combat plays out in 3 phases: The "Target Phase", "Choice Phase", and "Battle Phase".

- Target Phase:
The 4 participants will automatically determine their target(s) for the turn, influenced by their abilities.



- Choice Phase:
By using "mana", the player can choose cards to change the conditions of battle.
Aim to give your character the upper hand!
e.g. Increasing everyone's defense when your character is being targeted the most..



- Battle Phase:
All characters will perform their actions for the turn automatically, influenced by their abilities in the Target Phase, and the player's actions in the Choice Phase.
Turns continue in this way until an ultimate victor is determined.



Control the game! Control the battle!
Lead your chosen one to victory!!

name: ORDER9

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: About this game ORDER9 is an ‘auto-battle card game’ in which players use cards to turn the situation upside down in order to make their chosen character win in the arena.
